means: 增强，肿胀，鼓起(swell的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: My eyes were so swollen I could hardly see.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的眼睛肿得很厉害，几乎看不到东西。

sentence.Network_en: If untreated, the gums recede, become swollen and bleed.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果不进行治疗，牙龈会开始萎缩、红肿和出血。

sentence.Network_en: The sky, swollen like a black bladder, rumbled and crackled.
sentence.Network_cn: 天空中乌云黑沉沉地压下来，发出隆隆声和噼啪声。

肿胀(swollen)的瓣叶比融合的交界更易引起梗阻。三叶主动脉瓣的大小很少相等。异常的三叶主动脉瓣在婴儿早期可能并不引起梗阻,但是在之后的生命中由于瓣叶的增厚和.

entry.def: If a part of your body is swollen, it is larger and rounder than normal, usually as a result of injury or illness.

example.ex: My eyes were so swollen I could hardly see.
example.tran: 我的眼睛肿得很厉害，几乎看不到东西。

entry.def: A swollen river has more water in it and flows faster than normal, usually because of heavy rain.
Swollen is the past participle of swell.

means.word_mean: 1. abnormally distended especially by fluids or gas;
2. abnormally expanded or increased in size; (`swollen' is sometimes used in combination);

sentences.sentence: "the need to clean out swollen inventories"
"the raisins were plump and soft and swollen from being soaked"

means.word_mean: 3. characteristic of false pride; having an exaggerated sense of self-importance;

sentences.sentence: "so swollen by victory that he was unfit for normal duty"

auth_sentence.content: His eyes, eyelids, and face were swollen.
auth_sentence.res_content: His eyes, eyelids, and face were swollen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His eyes, eyelids, and face were swollen.

auth_sentence.content: The Major...swelling every already swollen vein in his head.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Major...swelling every already swollen vein in his head.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Major...swelling every already swollen vein in his head.

auth_sentence.content: He took a bad ankle knock...and it is very swollen.
auth_sentence.res_content: He took a bad ankle knock...and it is very swollen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He took a bad ankle knock...and it is very swollen.

means.word_mean: 膨胀的, 肿起的, 浮肿的

sentences.en: He gently rubbed his swollen nose.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地揉着肿胀的鼻子。

sentences.en: Her eyes were all red and swollen from crying.
sentences.cn: 她两只眼睛哭得又红又肿。

sentences.en: The doctors have taped his swollen ankle up.
sentences.cn: 医生们用绷带包扎了他肿起的脚踝。

sentences.en: Your neck looks swollen;let me have a feel.
sentences.cn: 你的脖子似乎肿了起来,让我摸摸看。

sentences.en: Her legs had got swollen from standing up all day.
sentences.cn: 因为整天站着 ，她的双腿已经肿了。

sentences.en: Her thin hands were twisted by swollen knuckles.
sentences.cn: 她那双纤手因肿大的指关节而变了形。

means.word_mean: 涨满的，涨水的，(河水)涨起的

sentences.en: The bridge collapsed into the swollen river.
sentences.cn: 桥陷入了暴涨的河水里。
